aboutIntro.heading: Our Story
aboutIntro.p1: GS ADVOGADOS is the first law firm established in Angola, structured to deliver fast and effective responses to our clients’ legal needs.
aboutIntro.p2: GS ADVOGADOS brings a seasoned team of lawyers who, practicing with vocation, devote themselves to safeguarding clients’ interests with dedication, insight, and strong professionalism.
aboutIntro.p3: At GS ADVOGADOS, we offer each client comprehensive, individualized, high-level attention. To better serve our clients, we invest in continuous training and the constant development of our legal team.

values.heading: Values
values.lead: GS ADVOGADOS upholds standardized business principles, innovation in quality control, promptness, confidentiality, dynamism, resilience, integrity, harmony, honesty, excellence, client orientation, and team competitiveness as a unifying factor among collaborators, aiming to maximize results and making GS ADVOGADOS the ideal partner for its clients. Among our values, we highlight:

recogSustain.heading: Recognition and sustainability
recogSustain.intro: Over the years, GS Advogados has consolidated its reputation through clients’ trust, legal rigor and the dedication of its team. This recognition reflects the quality of our services and our commitment to effective, innovative legal solutions aligned with social and environmental responsibility.

recognition.title: Recognition
recognition.body: The recognition we have achieved stems from clients’ trust, technical consistency and our team’s ethical commitment. We work to deliver results with promptness, accuracy and transparency.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.body: We promote responsible practices that contribute to the community and the environment. We support day-to-day initiatives and projects that generate positive impact.

competenciasPage.heroSubtitle: Discover the areas where we operate with expertise and proven results.

societarioComercial.title: Corporate and Commercial Law
societarioComercial.desc: Incorporation and reorganization of companies, corporate governance, M&A transactions and commercial contracts, with a strong focus on risk prevention and dispute resolution.

trabalhoSegurancaSocial.title: Labour Law and Social Security
trabalhoSegurancaSocial.desc: Comprehensive support in individual and collective labour relations, union negotiations, disciplinary proceedings, internal policies and compliance with social security obligations.

financeiroBancario.title: Financial and Banking Law
financeiroBancario.desc: Advising on financial regulation, credit and financing operations, guarantees, capital markets and compliance with financial system requirements.

familiaSucessorio.title: Family and Succession Law
familiaSucessorio.desc: Succession planning, management of family assets, divorce proceedings, inheritance distribution and resolution of family disputes with legal security and discretion.

civilImobiliario.title: Civil and Real Estate Law
civilImobiliario.desc: Acquisition and due diligence of properties, construction and engineering contracts, lease, purchase and sale, licensing and regularization of urban and rural properties.

administrativoPPP.title: Administrative Law and Public-Private Partnerships (PPP)
administrativoPPP.desc: Advising on public tenders, administrative contracts, concessions, PPPs and challenge of administrative acts before public authorities and administrative courts.

fiscalAduaneiro.title: Tax and Customs Law
fiscalAduaneiro.desc: Tax planning, legal framing of operations, tax litigation and assistance in customs matters related to the import and export of goods.

arbitragem.title: Arbitration
arbitragem.desc: Design of alternative dispute resolution strategies, representation in domestic and international arbitration proceedings and enforcement of arbitral awards.

penalEconomico.title: Economic and Corporate Criminal Law
penalEconomico.desc: Legal defence and support in criminal proceedings linked to economic and corporate activity, including the liability of managers and legal persons.

consumidor.title: Consumer Law
consumidor.desc: Support in consumer protection policies, consumer contracts, advertising compliance, product liability and resolution of disputes with consumers.

medico.title: Medical Law
medico.desc: Advising clinics, hospitals and healthcare professionals on civil and criminal liability, regulatory compliance and risk management in medical and health services.

investimentoPrivadoEstrangeiro.title: Private and Foreign Investment Law
investimentoPrivadoEstrangeiro.desc: Structuring investment projects, legal framing of foreign investors, incentives, registration and interaction with the competent authorities.

recursosNaturais.title: Natural Resources Law
recursosNaturais.desc: Licensing, contracts and regulation in the oil, gas, mining and energy sectors, including local content compliance and sector-specific regulatory obligations.

desporto.title: Sports Law
desporto.desc: Sports contracts, image rights, relations between athletes, clubs and federations, and dispute resolution before disciplinary bodies and arbitration panels.

propriedadeIntelectual.title: Intellectual Property
propriedadeIntelectual.desc: Registration and protection of trademarks, patents, copyrights, trade secrets and drafting of licensing, franchising and technology transfer agreements.

body: We assist with the incorporation of companies, drafting of shareholders’ agreements, corporate reorganisations and governance structures, with a strong focus on legal certainty and efficiency.
We act in merger, demerger, acquisition and other M&A transactions, from due diligence through to negotiation and execution of the relevant contracts.
We provide advice throughout the employment relationship, including hiring, internal regulations, disciplinary procedures and termination of employment.
We assist companies and employees with social security matters, contributions and benefits, as well as labour and social security disputes.
We advise financial institutions and corporates on credit and financing agreements, guarantees, factoring and other financial instruments.
We act in banking and financial regulation, compliance and anti–money laundering, as well as in disputes arising from financial transactions.
We assist families with succession planning, wills, donations and asset protection structures, helping to prevent future disputes.
We represent clients in divorce, inheritance, partition and other succession proceedings, with special attention to confidentiality and preservation of family relationships.
We act in the purchase and sale, lease, construction and financing of urban and rural properties, as well as in land and registry regularisation.
We conduct real estate due diligence and draft and review construction contracts, development agreements and real estate asset management arrangements.
We advise on public procurement procedures, from the preparation of bids to the performance of administrative contracts and concessions.
We support Public–Private Partnership (PPP) projects, including contractual structuring, risk allocation and interaction with public authorities.
We assist in responsible tax planning for domestic and cross–border operations and in the interpretation and application of tax legislation.
We act in tax and customs disputes, including challenges, claims, tax enforcement and issues related to the import and export of goods.
We represent clients in domestic and international arbitration proceedings, from the drafting of arbitration clauses to the full conduct of the case.
We design dispute resolution strategies using arbitration, mediation and other ADR mechanisms, and assist with the recognition and enforcement of arbitral awards.
We act in criminal proceedings related to business and economic activity, including economic, tax and corporate offences.
We provide preventive advice to managers and companies on criminal liability, implementation of compliance programmes and risk management.
We assist companies in designing consumer–facing policies, terms and conditions, guarantees and commercial practices that comply with consumer protection legislation.
We represent consumers and suppliers in disputes concerning defective products and services, advertising, billing and consumer contracts.
We advise hospitals, clinics, insurers and healthcare professionals on civil and criminal medical liability.
We act in disputes arising from alleged negligence, medical error, informed consent and the relationship between patients, providers and insurers.
We assist domestic and foreign investors in structuring investment projects, including the choice of legal vehicle, local partners and contractual model.
We support investment registration procedures, access to incentives and interaction with competent authorities through to the implementation of the project.
We act in projects in the oil, gas, mining and energy sectors, ensuring compliance with regulatory and local content requirements.
We draft and negotiate operational, service and joint venture agreements and other contracts specific to the natural resources industry.
We advise athletes, clubs, federations and agents on sports contracts, image rights and disciplinary matters.
We represent clients in disputes before federations, leagues, sports arbitration courts and other specialised bodies.
We assist with the registration, protection and management of trademarks, patents, industrial designs, copyrights and trade secrets.
We draft licensing, franchising, assignment and technology transfer agreements and act in disputes involving infringement of intellectual property rights.

competenciasSetores.heroSubtitle: Sectors where we operate with deep technical expertise and strategic insight.

empresarialComercial.title: Business and Commercial Sector
empresarialComercial.desc: We act for private companies of all sizes, including large corporations, SMEs and startups, in commercial, corporate and complex transactional matters.

financeiroBancario.title: Financial and Banking Sector
financeiroBancario.desc: We advise commercial and investment banks, microfinance institutions, insurers and investment funds, ensuring regulatory compliance and legal certainty in sophisticated financial operations.

publicoAdministracao.title: Public Sector and Administration
publicoAdministracao.desc: We provide legal advice and representation to ministries, public bodies and regulators, as well as in concession projects and public–private partnerships (PPP).

imobiliarioConstrucao.title: Real Estate and Construction Sector
imobiliarioConstrucao.desc: We support developers, construction companies and public or private entities in development, incorporation, leasing, transactions and regularisation of real estate assets.

industrialEnergetico.title: Industrial and Energy Sector
industrialEnergetico.desc: We assist companies in industrial and energy sectors, including oil, gas, mining and renewables, in complex contracts, regulatory compliance and large–scale projects.

saudeFarmaceutico.title: Health and Pharmaceutical Sector
saudeFarmaceutico.desc: We advise hospitals, clinics, laboratories, pharmaceutical companies, healthcare professionals and patients, safeguarding rights, regulatory compliance and mitigating legal risks.

desportivoCultural.title: Sports and Cultural Sector
desportivoCultural.desc: We act for clubs, federations, athletes, coaches and entertainment or cultural companies, in contracts, sponsorships, sports regulation and dispute resolution.

tecnologicoPropriedadeIntelectual.title: Technology and Intellectual Property Sector
tecnologicoPropriedadeIntelectual.desc: We assist technology companies, innovative startups and creators in the protection, valuation and strategic management of intellectual property and other intangible assets.

consumoServicos.title: Consumer and Services Sector
consumoServicos.desc: We work with retailers, distributors, service providers and franchising networks, ensuring compliance with consumer law and sound management of commercial risks.

internacionalInvestimentoEstrangeiro.title: International and Foreign Investment Sector
internacionalInvestimentoEstrangeiro.desc: We advise foreign investors, multinationals and joint venture projects at all stages of investment and entry into the Angolan market.

penalEconomico.title: Criminal and Economic Sector
penalEconomico.desc: We represent directors, officers and companies in economic and financial crime investigations and litigation, focusing on prevention, corporate compliance and strategic defence.

podcastPage.heroSubtitle: Clips and conversations on Law, business and society.

ep01.title: ARBITRAGEM INTERNACIONAL E DEFESA DE ESTADO: BASTIDORES E LIÇÕES PARA ANGOLA C/ DR PACOMÊ ZIEGLER
ep01.desc: O Dr. Guimarães Silva recebe o Dr. Pacomé Ziegler para uma conversa esclarecedora sobre os desafios que os Estados enfrentam em processos arbitrais internacionais, as estratégias de defesa mais eficazes e as boas práticas que podem reforçar a posição de Angola no panorama jurídico internacional.

ep02.title: ENTENDA COMO SE FAZ A EXECUÇÃO DE UMA SENTENÇA ARBITRAL!
ep02.desc: Entenda como se faz a execução de uma sentença arbitral.

ep1.title: Corte - Cultura no Processo Migratório Brasileiro
ep1.desc: Exploramos como a cultura se manifesta e se transforma no processo migratório brasileiro — das raízes que os migrantes trazem às adaptações no novo território.

ep2.title: Corte - Código de Conduta vs Realidade Factual
ep2.desc: A distância entre o que está escrito nos códigos de conduta e o que acontece no dia a dia, refletindo sobre ética, prática e contradições.

ep3.title: Medidas de Coação – Convidado: Dr. Sérgio Raimundo
ep3.desc: Análise clara sobre medidas de coação: objetivo, aplicação prática e impacto na proteção da justiça.

legalArticles.heroSubtitle: Technical analyses and practical reflections on legal topics.
legalArticles.intro: Welcome to our articles section, where we provide valuable insights on key legal issues. Our articles are designed to simplify legal complexity and keep you informed on relevant topics. Explore now and deepen your legal understanding with clear, reliable content.

a1.title: A Way to Understand Law, the Science of Law
a1.excerpt: An approach fostering academic growth and professional excellence in Legal Science.
body: ABSTRACT

This report presents an approach that contributes to academic and scientific growth and to professional excellence in Legal Science. Entitled “Legal-scientific research: a way to understand law, the science of law”, the study aims to encourage students and lecturers at FDUAN to deepen their methodological and investigative knowledge of legal science.

The report is structured in three chapters: (i) a brief theoretical framework on research methodology in law—definition of science, its features and classifications, core research paths and scholarly production; (ii) a concrete analysis of legal research methodology—empirical, interdisciplinary and complex; (iii) a concise guide on structuring a Master’s dissertation research project, following the Faculty of Law of Agostinho Neto University guidelines.
Keywords: Research Methods; Legal Research; Research Project; Legal Science.

a2.title: Legal Regime of Single-Member Companies under Angolan Law
a2.excerpt: A practical overview of the regime applicable to single-member companies in Angola.
body: ABSTRACT

This report examines the legal regime of single-member companies in the Angolan legal order. It studies the personal substratum that characterises single-member companies and distinguishes them from multi-member companies; the specific statute governing single-member companies in Angola; and other legislation directly or subsidiarily applicable to their organisation, incorporation and operation.

The research is relevant to identify how the Angolan legal framework addresses single-member companies in various aspects. It relies on bibliographic and statutory sources and a deductive method to analyse the main points and their practical implications. The study is justified by the relative novelty of single-member forms in Angolan legislation.
The work is organised in three chapters aligned with specific objectives, with the general aim of examining the legal regime of single-member companies in Angola.
Keywords: Single-member companies; Sole shareholder; Single-member status; Single-Member Companies Act.

a3.title: Brief Notes on the Exclusion of Partners in Limited Liability Companies
a3.excerpt: Evolution of partner exclusion and its application in Angolan law.
body: ABSTRACT

This article briefly outlines the evolution of partner exclusion in commercial companies, focusing on limited liability companies and its application within the Angolan legal system. From Roman Law—where any partner’s withdrawal dissolved the company—the text summarises later European rules that first introduced exclusion.

In Angola, Portuguese-inspired legislation grounds this institute, applying exclusion in a limited and specific way depending on the company type. The paper reviews legal and contractual provisions enabling exclusion and suggests improvements to strengthen legal certainty in corporate relations.

a4.title: Medical Civil Liability in Angola: Key Lines
a4.excerpt: Overview of liability elements in medical practice, informed consent and notes on case law.
body: Content in preparation. The full version of this article will be available soon.
